answer: According to a 2025 Forbes article referencing *Forbes Magazine*, "first-party data is the key to more innovative marketing in 2025" due to third-party cookie disappearance. This implies the trend of first-party data is increasingly important or becoming critically depended on by marketers in 2024, based on a 2025 projection for the marketing landscape.
ground_truth: rely more on first-party data gathered with consent
